name: 10.5 "Ma's Little Maggie" Trivia Game | 'Cheers'- Season 10 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Why was Cliff all dressed up?
questions.explanation:
Maggie was in town.

	Carla told him, "It's as shinny as the nickle you spent on it". (It meaning the suit he was wearing). Cliff said that Maggie got tired of the cold in Canada so she came back to him.

questions.text: Why did Ma Clavin make Cliff wear a shower cap?
options: He didn't eat his Brussels sprouts.
She thought it was a good fashion statement.
questions.explanation:
He didn't put it back.

	Cliff just got done saying his mom wouldn't embarrass him in a public place.  Ma and Cliff have a very strange relationship, one which isn't very healthy.

questions.text: How many months have Sam and Rebecca been trying to have a baby as of this episode?
questions.explanation:
2.

	Sam was drinking coffee and Rebecca told him he couldn't. She said maybe the reason she wasn't pregnant after two months was he didn't stay in shape.

questions.text: What letter did Sam use on his calendar for the days he and Rebecca should make love?
questions.explanation:
F.

	Sam said it stood for "fertile". Rebecca thought it meant something else. She used a B on her calendar for "baby".

questions.text: What is Ma Clavin's blood type?
questions.explanation:
O.

	She said that anyone with blood type O could use her organs. She was being very dramatic because Cliff told her about Margaret.

questions.text: What did Margaret say attracted her to Cliff?
options: Nothing, she just felt sorry for him
questions.explanation:
Trivia and his manners.

	Ma Clavin started to change her mind about Margaret when she found out she liked trivia. Like her son, Ma Clavin knew a lot of totally useless trivia facts on many subjects.

questions.text: Did Cliff know that he was getting married before Ma Clavin announced it?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Cliff was in the bathroom when he came out and everyone was clapping. When he asked what was going on, Ma Calvin replied, "Your wedding, Clifford."

questions.text: Who gave Cliff "the talk" about where babies come from before Ma Clavin?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Ma Clavin called the person a "dirty mouth". Norm said he used a different word for hug when he explained it.

questions.text: What were Margaret's parents giving them?
questions.explanation:
a freezer full of meat.

	Margaret was very excited when she told Cliff that her parents were thrilled that she was getting married. Cliff smiled, but was not to sure about the wedding, but appeared to be happy.

questions.text: What did Cliff tell Margaret about Carla?
options: They were engaged so he couldn't possibly marry Maggie
questions.explanation:
They had an affair.

	Carla could only say "I..I...I..." Maggie said Rebecca and Cliff also had an affair.
